title: The Killer Elite.1975.[BETTER THAN 720p LOW BITRATERIPS].960x416
description:
Rerip of 6.91GB 1080p BD rip from KESH. Two rips are provided. Both have 160kbps AAC sound (mono, as the original film) and English text (can be switched off). Other data:

1. The Killer Elite.1975.720p.x264-Clone.mkv: 1280x544px 2500kbps video. This is the optimum bitrate for a 720p rip (I tried also 3000k which was the same, 2000k which was significantly worse, 1000k which was like 2000k, and I tried 3000k 1080p which was worse.) 

2. The Killer Elite.1975.960x416.x264-Clone.mkv: 960x416px 1000kbps video. This is the optimum rsolution for a 1000kbps rip. At 1000k I also tried 1920x816 (1080p), 1280x544 (720p), 720x304, anamorphic 720x408 and anamorphic 960x544 (the latter had somewhat better resolution for vertical details but slightly worse for horixzontal details). 960x416 chosen instead of the 960x408 which would give the exact right aspect ratio, since multiples of 16 are more optimal for x264.

See screenshots. Escpecially look at fine lines such as lines in faces and hair.

Since my 960x416 rip has better quality than the "720p" rips with size around 1GB that are so common these days, I put it in the 720p department. Might give a wake-up call to those who provide 720p low bitrate rips..
